5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Uthman bin Abul-‘As said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘I hear an infant crying so I make the prayer short.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِمَامِ يُخَفِّفُ الصَّلاَةَ إِذَا حَدَثَ أَمْرٌ
chapter.eng-name: The Imam should make the Prayer short if something happens
